problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that AB = DC, AD = BC, E and F are two points on DB and BF = DE, if ∠AEB = N_0, ∠ADB = N_1, then ∠BCF = ()
raw_answer: 解:∵AB=DC,AD=BC,∴四边形ABCD为平行四边形,∴∠ADE=∠CBF,∵BF=DE,∴△ADE≌△CBF,∴∠BCF=∠DAE,∵∠DAE=180°-∠ADB-∠AED,∵∠AED=180°-∠AEB=60°,∠ADB=30°,∴∠BCF=90°．故选:D．
raw_comment: 本题主要考查了平行四边形的性质,运用平行四边形的性质解决以下问题,如求角的度数、线段的长度,证明角相等或互补,证明线段相等或倍分等．
